mapper.select: SELECT qcc_administrative_license.id, qcc_administrative_license.enterprise_id enterpriseId, qcc_administrative_license.decision_document_no decisionDocumentNo, qcc_administrative_license.license_authority licenseAuthority, qcc_administrative_license.license_date licenseDate, qcc_administrative_license.content, qcc_administrative_license.valid_from validFrom, qcc_administrative_license.valid_until validUntil, qcc_administrative_license.decision_document_name decisionDocumentName FROM qcc_administrative_license WHERE qcc_administrative_license.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and qcc_administrative_license.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT `qcc_bidding`.`id`,`qcc_bidding`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_bidding`.`name`,`qcc_bidding`.`province`,`qcc_bidding`.`progress` FROM `qcc_bidding` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT `qcc_land_purchase_information`.`id`, `qcc_land_purchase_information`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_land_purchase_information`.`location`, `qcc_land_purchase_information`.`purpose`, `qcc_land_purchase_information`.`area`, `qcc_land_purchase_information`.`administrative_region` administrativeRegion, `qcc_land_purchase_information`.`land_supply_mode` landSupplyMode, `qcc_land_purchase_information`.`contract_signing_date` contractSigningDate FROM `qcc_land_purchase_information` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT `qcc_supplier`.`id`, `qcc_supplier`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_supplier`.`name`, `qcc_supplier`.`proportion_of_procurement` proportionOfProcurement, `qcc_supplier`.`purchase_amount` purchaseAmount, `qcc_supplier`.`report_period` reportPeriod, `qcc_supplier`.`source`, `qcc_supplier`.`relationship` FROM `qcc_supplier` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT `qcc_client`.`id`, `qcc_client`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_client`.`name`, `qcc_client`.`sale_proportion` saleProportion, `qcc_client`.`sale_amount` saleAmount, `qcc_client`.`report_date` reportDate, `qcc_client`.`source`, `qcc_client`.`relationship` FROM `qcc_client` WHERE qcc_client.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} and qcc_client.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}

select id, enterprise_id enterpriseId, name, code, qualification_type qualificationType, competent_tax_authority competentTaxAuthority, valid_from validFrom, valid_end validEnd from qcc_general_taxpayer where id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} and `status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}

SELECT `qcc_administrative_sanction`.`id`, `qcc_administrative_sanction`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_administrative_sanction`.`determine_document_number` determineDocumentNumber, `qcc_administrative_sanction`.`violations_type` violationsType, `qcc_administrative_sanction`.`content`, `qcc_administrative_sanction`.`publication_date` publicationDate, `qcc_administrative_sanction`.`decision_making_organ` decisionMakingOrgan, `qcc_administrative_sanction`.`decision_date` decisionDate FROM `qcc_administrative_sanction` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT qcc.id qcc_id, qcc.enterprise_id qcc_enterprise_id, `qcc_remove_exception`.`id` qre_id, `qcc_remove_exception`.`enterprise_id` qre_enterprise_id, `qcc_remove_exception`.`save_reason` qre_save_reason, `qcc_remove_exception`.`desicion_authority` qre_desicion_authority, `qcc_remove_exception`.`remove_date` qre_remove_date, `qcc_remove_exception`.`remove_reason` qre_remove_reason, `qcc_save_exception`.`id`, `qcc_save_exception`.`enterprise_id`, `qcc_save_exception`.`save_date`, `qcc_save_exception`.`desicion_authority`, `qcc_save_exception`.`save_reason` FROM qcc LEFT JOIN `qcc_remove_exception` ON qcc.enterprise_id = `qcc_remove_exception`.`enterprise_id` LEFT JOIN `qcc_save_exception` ON qcc.enterprise_id = `qcc_save_exception`.`enterprise_id` WHERE qcc.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} and qcc.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}

SELECT `qcc_annual_report`.`id`, `qcc_annual_report`.`uuid`, `qcc_annual_report`.`enterprise_id`, `qcc_annual_report`.`year`, `qcc_annual_report`.`unified_social_credit_code`, `qcc_annual_report`.`registration_number`, `qcc_annual_report`.`business_status`, `qcc_annual_report`.`business_telephone`, `qcc_annual_report`.`e_mail`, `qcc_annual_report`.`post_code`, `qcc_annual_report`.`staff_number`, `qcc_annual_report`.`equity_transfer`, `qcc_annual_report`.`purchase_equity`, `qcc_annual_report`.`postal_address`, `qcc_annual_report`.`total_assets`, `qcc_annual_report`.`total_equity`, `qcc_annual_report`.`total_operating_income`, `qcc_annual_report`.`total_profit`, `qcc_annual_report`.`net_profit`, `qcc_annual_report`.`main_business_income`, `qcc_annual_report`.`total_tax`, `qcc_annual_report`.`total_liabilities`, `qcc_annual_report`.`endowment_insurance`, `qcc_annual_report`.`medical_insurance`, `qcc_annual_report`.`maternity_insurance`, `qcc_annual_report`.`unemployment_insurance`, `qcc_annual_report`.`employment_injury_insurance`, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`id` s_id, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`annual_report_uuid` s_annual_report_uuid, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`enterprise_id` s_enterprise_id, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`name` s_name, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`subscribed_capital` s_subscribed_capital, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`subscribed_capital_date` s_subscribed_capital_date, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`subscribed_capital_way` s_subscribed_capital_way, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`paid_capital` s_paid_capital, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`paid_capital_date` s_paid_capital_date, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`paid_capital_way` s_paid_capital_way FROM `qcc_annual_report` LEFT JOIN qcc_annual_report_shareholder ON qcc_annual_report.uuid = qcc_annual_report_shareholder.annual_report_uuid WHERE qcc_annual_report.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and `qcc_annual_report`.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT `qcc_financing_consultation`.`id`, `qcc_financing_consultation`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_financing_consultation`.`date`, `qcc_financing_consultation`.`name`, `qcc_financing_consultation`.`financing_round` financingRound, `qcc_financing_consultation`.`amount`, `qcc_financing_consultation`.`investor`, `qcc_financing_consultation`.`source` FROM `qcc_financing_consultation` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, enterprise_id enterpriseId, name, duty, shareholding_ratio shareholdingRatio, ultimate_beneficial_shares ultimateBeneficialShares from qcc_keyman where id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} and `status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}

SELECT `qcc_software_copyright`.`id`, `qcc_software_copyright`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_software_copyright`.`name`, `qcc_software_copyright`.`version`, `qcc_software_copyright`.`release_date` releaseDate, `qcc_software_copyright`.`abbreviation`, `qcc_software_copyright`.`registration_number` registrationNumber, `qcc_software_copyright`.`registration_approval_date` registrationApprovalDate FROM `qcc_software_copyright` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT `qcc_app`.`id`, `qcc_app`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_app`.`name`, `qcc_app`.`sort`, `qcc_app`.`current_version` currentVersion, `qcc_app`.`brief_introduction` briefIntroduction FROM `qcc_app` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT `qcc_applet`.`id`, `qcc_applet`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_applet`.`name`, `qcc_applet`.`sort`, `qcc_applet`.`associated_official_account` associatedOfficialAccount, `qcc_applet`.`predict_reading_volume` predictReadingVolume FROM `qcc_applet` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT `qcc_wechat`.`id`, `qcc_wechat`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_wechat`.`name`, `qcc_wechat`.`account`, `qcc_wechat`.`brief_introduction` briefIntroduction FROM `qcc_wechat` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT `qcc_weibo`.`id`, `qcc_weibo`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_weibo`.`nickname`, `qcc_weibo`.`industry_category` industryCategory, `qcc_weibo`.`brief_introduction` briefIntroduction FROM `qcc_weibo` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
